simergy.core.resources

Class Physician

  • java.lang.Object
    • simergy.core.resources.Resource
      • simergy.core.resources.HumanResource
        • simergy.core.resources.Physician
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Physician
extends HumanResource
    The Class Physician. This class represents is used to represent a physician. A physician has patients to see, overseen patients and treated patient. A patient to see is the "waiting queue" of the physician whereas an overseen patient is a patient attributed to the physician but not yet treated.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        name - the physician's name
        surname - the physician's surname

      • Physician

        public Physician(int id)
        Instantiates a new physician. Both name and surname are set to "physicianN" where N is the id of the resource

      • addPatient

        public void addPatient(Patient patient)
        Adds a new patient to the physician. Technically, the patient is added to the overseen patients and to the patients to see If the patient is at a critical severity level, it is set as the current patient
        Parameters:
        patient - the patient

      • notify

        public void notify(Patient patient)
        Notify the physician. Adds a patient to the patients to see
        Parameters:
        patient - the patient
